stem: If you are deploying applications in your Pods that need persistent storage, which controller type should you use?
What is the purpose of a Service? Choose all that are true (2 correct answers)
options/0/title: To allow you to choose how Pods are exposed
options/1/title: To allow you to put constraints on Pods' resource consumption
options/2/title: To provide a load-balancing network endpoint for Pods
options/3/title: To provide a way to inspect and diagnose code running in a Pod
